import {useState} from 'react' import Logo from '../assets/logo.png' import {FaBars, FaTimes} from 'react-icons/fa' const Navbar = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) const toggleHamburger = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen) } return (
{/* Main Menu */}
  • Home
  • About
  • Skills
  • Work
  • Contact
{/* Mobile Menu */}
  • Home
  • About
  • Skills
  • Work
  • Contact
{/* Social Icons */}
) } export default Navbar
